title: Africa: Nigeria Stuns South Africa - Super Eagles Zoom Into 2024 Afcon Final
description: [Premium Times] Two penalty goals sent this encounter into penalties, where South Africa-based Nigerian goalkeeper Nwabali made two saves to send Nigeria into Sunday's final.

title: Africa: Nigeria Vs South Africa - What Nwabali Told Me Before Afcon - Bafana Gk Williams
description: [Vanguard] Bafana Bafana of South Africa goalkeeper, Ronwen Williams has revealed that he had a conversation with Nigeria's Stanley Nwabali before the commencement of the ongoing Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) in Cote d'Ivoire.

title: Africa: COP 10 - Does the Implementation of the FCTC Exclude the People Most Affected by Tobacco?
description: [allAfrica] Tobacco continues to affect the entire planet. According to the World Health Organization (WHO), the number of smokers is estimated at 1.1 billion smokers in 2025 if recent trends continue. The WHO's Framework Convention on Tobacco Control (FCTC), during its tenth Conference of the Parties (COP 10), is currently examining in Panama the implementation of tobacco control with the 183 member countries of the Convention.

title: Africa: COP 10 - Health And Politics: Is There A Lack Of Transparency ?
description: [allAfrica] The tenth Conference of Parties (COP 10) of the World Health Organization's (WHO) meeting on the Framework Convention on Tobacco Control (FCTC) is currently underway in Panama until February 10th, 2024.

title: Africa: Nigeria Vs South Africa - Matters Arising
description: [Daily Trust] The semi-final clash between the Super Eagles of Nigeria and the Bafana Bafana of South Africa has created a tense atmosphere among citizens of both countries. There is a palpable fear of xenophobic attacks against Nigerians living in South Africa in the event that Nigeria beats South Africa to qualify for the final of the 2023 African Cup of Nations in Côte d'Ivoire. This fear is amplified by the advisory on safe conduct issued by the High Commission of Nigeria in South Africa, both before, during,

title: Africa: South Africa Reacts to Concerns About Safety of Nigerians
description: [Premium Times] The Nigerian High Commission in South Africa had earlier notified nationals living in South Africa of possible violent attacks following inflammatory comments made online by South Africans against Nigerians.

title: Africa: Players to Watch in Nigeria Vs South Africa Match
description: [Premium Times] The battle for space in the final thirds will be crucial to determining who wins a final ticket when Nigeria confronts South Africa in Bouake on Wednesday

title: Africa: Afcon 2023 - Group Donates Jerseys to Super Eagles' Fans Ahead of South Africa Clash
description: [Premium Times] Mohammed urged Nigerians to unite behind the Super Eagles as they confront South Africa on Wednesday

title: Africa: Microplastics Found in Nile River's Tilapia Fish - New Study
description: [The Conversation Africa] The Nile is one of the world's most famous rivers. It's also Africa's most important freshwater system. About 300 million people live in the 11 countries it flows through. Many rely on its waters for agriculture and fishing to make a living.

title: Africa: Money Helps People Live Longer - Study
description: [The Conversation Africa] Nearly half of South Africa's 60 million people receive social grants, ranging from child support to pensions. The grants are designed to provide financial assistance to people living in poverty.

title: Africa: Cholera Cases Surging in Africa, Says WHO
description: [UN News] Cholera cases are surging globally, and there's been an unprecedented spike in Africa, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Tuesday.

title: Africa: Defying Tradition, Championing Rights
description: [UNFPA] "Is [female genital mutilation] religious?" Under a tree in the quiet village of Dalocha Woreda in Central Ethiopia region, Nuritu Sirbar, the Head of the Dalocha district Women and Children's Affairs Office, challenged community and religious leaders four years ago to justify a deeply ingrained tradition - female genital mutilation (FGM).

title: Africa: Despite the Hazards, Ghana's Illicit Waste Trade Is Booming
description: [ISS] Ghana cannot recycle all its hazardous waste imports, but that hasn't curbed its role in the billion-dollar global business.

title: Africa: Long Road in a Short Time - Ending FGM Calls for Immediate Action
description: [UNFPA] "A woman is a full circle; within her is the power to create, nurture, and transform."

title: Africa: DRC Misses Another Opportunity to Build a Democracy
description: [ISS] After accusations of an 'electoral coup' in 2018, the country's December 2023 polls were equally lacking in legitimacy.

title: Africa: AU Summit 2024 Nat'l Committee Finalizes Preparations
description: [Ethiopian Herald] Committee for the African Union 44th Executive Council and 37th Ordinary Session of Heads of States announced that the preparation to receive AU guests has already finalized preparations.

title: Africa: Road to COP29 - Highest Climate Ambitions Needed to Decarbonize World
description: [IPS] Nairobi -- The road to COP29 has begun in earnest in the backdrop of a global climate report indicating that not only was 2023 the warmest year in a 174-year climate record, it was the warmest by far. Record-breaking temperatures, combined with El Niño, pushed vulnerable and poor nations in the Global South to the frontlines of extreme and severe weather events.

title: Africa: Landlocked Developing Countries Conference to Address Development
description: [IPS] United Nations -- Landlocked developing countries need greater support from the international community so that they are no longer left behind when it comes to progressing with the SDGs, says the UN High Representative of the Least Developed Countries.
